text: Sami Kohen (20 April 1928 â€“ 18 October 2021) was a Turkish journalist and columnist. He wrote regular columns about foreign policy for Milliyet, beginning in 1954. He also worked for The New York Times. On 12 October 2020, he was given the High Service Award. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Turkish journalists Category:Columnists Category:Writers from Istanbul
